referrals_eng.category:
Police (SAPS): 10111

Emergency Line: 112

Ambulance: 10177

Fire Department: 10177

Crime Stop: 0860 010 111

General: 0800 4357 4 8

SADAG (all types of mental health support):
0800 567 567 / www.sadag.org

Lifeline (Counselling): 
0861 322 322 or WhatsApp call: 065 989 9238

Childline 116

AIDS: 0800 012 322

Cancer: 0800 226 622

Family planning, abortion and sexual health: 
0800 117 785 (Marie Stopes SA) / 086 132 2322 (Lifeline) / https://www.westerncape.gov.za/service/termination-pregnancy-top
 
Men's sexual health (including circumcision): Ask a sister at your local clinic

Crime Stop: 0860 010 111

Childline: 116

Gender Based Violence (GBV) 24/7: 0800 428 428 or send a please call me to *120*7867#

Thuthuzela Clinic (GBV/rape/sexual abuse): find your nearest one at https://www.gov.za/TCC
 
Safeline (male survivor helpline): 0800 035 553

Refugee support: WhatsApp 063 656 5080 (for children) or 078 594 5591 (for refugee rights)

South Africa National Emergency Line: 112

Ambulance and Fire Department: 10177

SANCA: 011 892 3829 or WhatsApp call 076 535 1701 / www.sancanational.info

Department of Social Development (DSD) 24/7: 0800 121 314 or send a SMS to 32312

WhatsApp Chat Line: 087 163 2025 (8am-5pm)

Al-Anon (for families affected by alcohol): 086 125 2666

Nar-Anon (for families affected by drugs): 088 129 6791

See also: https://www.westerncape.gov.za/directories/facilities/736

Department of Social Development hotline (weekdays 8am-4pm): 0800 220 250

ACVV: www.acvv.org.za

Child Welfare: 087 822 1516 / 021 638 3127 (Cape Town)

Badisa: www.badisa.org.za

FAMSA Western Cape: 067 082 1567 / www.famsawc.org.za/our-offices

Childline: 116 / www.childlinesa.org.za

Caring for the aged: Your local DSD office can assist with this as well! (Call 0800 220 250, weekdays 8am-4pm)

Black sash helpline: Call/WhatsApp 072 663 3739 or 063 610 1865 

Legal Aid: 0800 110 110 or send a please call me to: 079 835 7179 

UCT law clinic: WhatsApp 068 350 5920

SASSA: www.sassa.gov.za Click the 'social grants' tab to see what support you qualify for!

Refugee law clinic: WhatsApp 072 499 8146 (for status) or 
078 594 5591 (for rights)

SADAG Helpline: 0800 567 567 / Online support groups: www.sadag.org 

Gender Based Violence (GBV) 24/7: 0800 428 428 or send a please call me to *120*7867#

SA school helpline: 0800 202 933

Safe Schools: 0800 456 647

Western Cape schools: 0861 819 919

Contact your local DSD office or go to: https://www.westerncape.gov.za/service/persons-disabilities-programme

For all disabilities: WhatsApp 081 517 8757 / https://wcapd.org.za/contact-us/ 

Autism SA: www.aut2know.co.za

BlindSA helpline: 060 967 0258
